targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "ceph_health_status" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("total_avail_bytes") FROM "ceph_usage" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("total_used_bytes") FROM "ceph_usage" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("num_object") FROM "ceph" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("num_pg") FROM "ceph" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("num_pool") FROM "ceph" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("full") FROM "ceph_osdmap" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
select last("num_osds") from "ceph_osdmap" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
select last("num_in_osds") from "ceph_osdmap" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
select last("num_up_osds") from "ceph_osdmap" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
select last("num_osds") - last("num_up_osds") from "ceph_osdmap" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("nearfull") FROM "ceph_osdmap" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("num_mon") FROM "ceph" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("num_mon_quorum") FROM "ceph" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT  (last("num_object_degraded") / last("num_object")) * 100 FROM "ceph" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT  (last("num_object_misplaced") / last("num_object")) * 100 FROM "ceph" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT (last("total_used_bytes") / last("total_avail_bytes")) * 100 FROM "ceph_usage" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT  mean("num_object") AS "Total" FROM "ceph" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT  mean("num_object_degraded") AS "Degraded" FROM "ceph" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT  mean("num_object_misplaced") AS "Misplaced" FROM "ceph" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT  mean("num_object_unfound") AS "Unfound" FROM "ceph" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("read_op_per_sec") AS "Read IOPs" FROM "ceph_pgmap" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("write_op_per_sec") AS "Write IOPs" FROM "ceph_pgmap" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("read_bytes_sec") AS "Read bytes sec" FROM "ceph_pgmap" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("write_bytes_sec") AS "Write bytes sec" FROM "ceph_pgmap" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("num_pg") AS "Total" FROM "ceph" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("count") FROM "ceph_pgmap_state" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "state" fill(null)
SELECT mean("read_bytes_sec") AS "Read bytes" FROM "ceph_pool_stats" WHERE "name" =~ /^$pool$/  AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT mean( "write_bytes_sec") AS "Write bytes" FROM "ceph_pool_stats" WHERE "name" =~ /^$pool$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT mean("read_op_per_sec") AS "Read IOPs" FROM "ceph_pool_stats" WHERE   "name" =~ /^$pool$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT mean( "write_op_per_sec") AS "Write IOPs" FROM "ceph_pool_stats" WHERE "name" =~ /^$pool$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT mean("percent_used") AS "Percent used" FROM "ceph_pool_usage" WHERE "name" =~ /^$pool$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(none)
SELECT mean("bytes_used") AS "Used", mean("max_avail") AS "Available" FROM "ceph_pool_usage" WHERE "name" =~ /^$pool$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(none)
SELECT mean("objects") AS "Objects" FROM "ceph_pool_usage" WHERE ("name" =~ /^$pool$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(none)
SELECT mean("recovering_objects_per_sec") AS "Recovering objects" FROM "ceph_pool_stats" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT mean("recovering_bytes_per_sec") AS "Recovering bytes" FROM "ceph_pool_stats" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT mean("recovering_keys_per_sec") AS "Recovering keys" FROM "ceph_pool_stats" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT mean("refresh_latency.avgtime") AS "Refresh" FROM "ceph" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "collection" fill(null)
SELECT mean("begin_latency.avgtime") AS "Begin" FROM "ceph" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "collection" fill(null)
SELECT mean("collect_latency.avgtime") AS "Collect" FROM "ceph" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "collection" fill(null)
SELECT mean("commit_latency.avgtime") AS "Commit" FROM "ceph" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "collection" fill(null)
SELECT mean("new_pn_latency.avgtime") AS "New PN" FROM "ceph" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "collection" fill(null)
SELECT mean("get_latency.avgtime") AS "Get" FROM "ceph" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "collection" fill(null)
SELECT mean("complete_latency.avgtime") AS "Complete" FROM "ceph" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "collection" fill(null)
SELECT mean("store_state__latency.avgtime") AS "Store state" FROM "ceph" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "collection" fill(null)

list.label: Ceph Pools
list.name: pool
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "ceph_pool_usage" WITH KEY = "name"

list.label: Hosts
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "ceph_health_status" WITH KEY = "host"
